name: Vancouver SMP | Advanced Scalp Micropigmentation Artist - Rob James

owner.name: Vancouver SMP | Advanced Scalp Micropigmentation Artist - Rob James (Owner)

address: Vancouver SMP | Advanced Scalp Micropigmentation Artist - Rob James, 6989 Victoria Dr, Vancouver, BC V5P 3Y7

featured_reviews.review_id:
Rob is without a doubt THE BEST SMP Artist in Vancouver. I probably spent over a year researching SMP Artists in and am SO happy that I went with Rob. His transformations speak for themselves and I left his studio feeling like a new person. If you're looking for NATURAL Results by one of the best, Rob James is your man.

Thanks again for everything Rob!
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.review_id:
I want to express my heartfelt gratitude to Mr. Rob James. The journey my wife and I undertook in researching SMP was quite extensive, and locating a truly proficient specialist proved to be highly challenging. Encountering Mr. James was a stroke of luck for us, and we couldn't be more pleased with the outcomes.

Especially, he achieved the most natural results concerning my hairline and color intensity, which is truly the most satisfying aspect for me. Believe me, not only is he the top SMP specialist in Western Canada, but he is also among the world's leading experts. I have searched for SMP specialists in various Asian countries, including Korea, but finding someone who delivers results as natural as Mr. James was exceedingly challenging. Once again, I want to express my gratitude to him.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Thank you so, so much Sang, I really appreciate it. Wonderful working with you and I look forward to seeing you again in 2024. Until then take good care and thank you again.
Rob

featured_reviews.review_id: I recently completed a scalp micro-pigmentation class with Rob and I couldn't be more impressed with the experience. He was knowledgeable and patient, providing a comprehensive understanding of the technique. The hands-on practice sessions were invaluable, and I left with the confidence to perform SMP procedures on my own.  Rob continues to give support even after the course was completed. The class materials were well organized, and the kit he provided was top tier. Overall, it was an excellent learning opportunity, and I highly recommend this course to anyone interested in SMP.
featured_reviews.review_text: I recently completed a scalp micro-pigmentation class with Rob and I couldn't be more impressed with the experience. He was knowledgeable and patient, providing a comprehensive understanding of the technique. featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Thank you so, so much Tracey, I truly appreciate the review. It was a fantastic experience training you and getting to know you. You're already a highly talented and skilled PMU artist and SMP is going to be a great addition to your business. I truly look forward to helping you and watching you succeed in the art of SMP.  

Rob

featured_reviews.review_id:
Review: Rob James - Masterful SMP Experience

Rob James is a true master at what he does. From the moment I met him, his ability to clearly communicate all the details and process involved made the entire experience enjoyable. He took the time to patiently explain every aspect of the Scalp Micropigmentation (SMP) procedure, ensuring that I had a thorough understanding of what to expect. His professionalism and passion for his work were evident throughout, instilling confidence in his abilities.

During the SMP process, Rob's attention to detail and precision were remarkable. He carefully considered factors such as hairline design, color matching, and shading, ensuring that the results would look natural and seamlessly blend with my existing hair. The final outcome exceeded my expectations, and I couldn't be happier with the results. Rob's talent for creating realistic and flawless SMP results is truly impressive.

Aside from his exceptional skills, Rob's friendly and approachable demeanor made the entire experience even more enjoyable. We spent several hours chatting during the sessions, and it felt like spending time with a friend rather than a professional. His ability to make me feel comfortable and at ease was genuinely appreciated.

If you're looking for a skilled SMP practitioner who can deliver outstanding results while making the process enjoyable, look no further than Rob James.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Thank you so much for the kind review, it has been fantastic working with you and getting to know you. I look forward to catching up again soon. Until then, take good care.
Sincerely,
Rob

featured_reviews.review_id:
I was lucky enough to meet Rob during a consultation for a loved one and was immediately struck by his professionalism and knowledge.

Months later, I began researching SMP teaching  courses and was pleasantly surprised to see that Rob is facilitating SMP courses at his Vancouver studio.

Rob James is not only an artist but a first rate instructor. His attention to detail, demeanour, knowledge, set up,  student preparation and, of course, patience is excellent. There was not a moment where I didn't feel I was getting the best SMP education available and I would recommend his course (or his work) 100%.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much Kareen, it has been an absolute pleasure teaching you. I hope to continue helping and guiding you continually along the way. You're going to be an outstanding and positive force in the Canadian SMP industry. Take good care, talk soon.

featured_reviews.review_id: I recently completed a Scalp Micropigmentation course, and it exceeded my expectations. The Rob the instructor, was extremely  knowledgeable, and the hands-on training was amazing. I learned the art of SMP, from proper technique to color matching and client consultations. This course provided a solid foundation to start a career in SMP. I usually leave asking myself if I am able to pursue, but I left feeling confident with Rob's guidance. I'm grateful for the expertise I gained, and I highly recommend this course to anyone looking to excel in the field of Scalp Micropigmentation! Thanks for a great class, Rob!
featured_reviews.review_text: I recently completed a Scalp Micropigmentation course, and it exceeded my expectations. I'm grateful for the expertise I gained, and I highly recommend this course to anyone looking to excel in the field of Scalp Micropigmentation! Thanks for a great class, Rob!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Thank you so much Jenny, you were an absolute pleasure to train, work with and get to know. You're going to excel in the world of SMP and I am honoured to be able to guide and assist you on your journey. Look forward to seeing you again on your shadow day. Until then, take good care.

Rob

featured_reviews.review_id:
This is the man you're looking for to perform your SMP treatment.

Not only is Rob a virtuoso in his field, he's also a really great guy. You'll spend quite a bit of time together when you're in the studio, and to be honest, I really looked forward to each session. I had been researching this for a long time but never really felt like I was ready to pull the trigger. However, I can confidently tell you that Rob is the last Instagram feed you'll scroll through, the last Google review page you'll need to pour over and the final free consultation you'll make.

A gentleman and a scholar, Rob made me feel totally comfortable throughout the entire process. He's one of the oldest SMP artists in North America and his volume work speaks for itself. Oh, and something unique about Rob, he REALLY loves what he does. That passion was evident from first meeting him and it really helped solidify that I had made the right choice.

Thanks, Rob!

Wow! Thank you so, so much for the very kind words, I truly do appreciate it. You have been a pleasure to work with and I really look forward to catching up again soon! Until then, take good care.
Sincerely,
Rob

featured_reviews.review_id:
Extremely happy with my results! Great service from beginning to end. Like many say, my only regret is that I didn't do this sooner!

I was on the fence for a long time regarding SMP. Wasn't sure if it would look ok and where to start looking. Rob James came highly recommended by a colleague. His results looked very natural and I can see the confidence it gave him. I decided to reach out to Rob after looking at looking at his website, Instagram, looking at reviews and even checking out other providers.

During our consultation Rob explained the process and expectations. Rob was not only professional, but was very easy to talk to. I wasn't rushed or pressured. It wasn't a pushy sales pitch. He was just extremely knowledgeable and a genuinely kind  person that cares about your results.

The studio is private, clean and easy. Everything about it was easy - easy to get to, easy to park, no shared space or hallways with other businesses. A private appointment means just that.

I've completed 3 sessions with Rob and it looks awesome! I love that it's natural looking and I am gob smacked at times when looking in the mirror. The sessions in the studio breeze by. There's always something to talk about and we even talk about nothing. Lots of laughs for sure. You can tell Rob loves what he does and is a craftsman with his work.  I highly recommend Rob James for your SMP needs.

Thank you Rob! I look forward to catching up soon!
